name: OrderBud
subtitle: Social marketplace for local small businesses
description: OrderBud is a marketplace app that helps users find small businesses in their neighbourhood that sell products they are looking for. Users can explore the menus of nearby businesses and purchase products from them through the app. An in-app social network was also developed to enable users to share their purchases and highlight recommendations to friends.

name: Flashback
subtitle: Photo repository facilitating natural language search of memories
description: Flashback is a photo repository that enables you to upload individual or collections of memories and tag them with details you associate with that memory. This tagging powers a search-rank algorithm that allowed users to search memories as they had remembered them using natural language.

name: Smart Brain
subtitle: Facial recognition web application
description: This is a web application I built as the final project of the The Complete Web Developer Zero To Mastery course on Udemy. It is an app that can detect faces in images! Simply provide the URL to an image online, and the program will find the faces in the picture.
